alert.note: Alert for Polk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 5:46PM CDT until May 05 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Polk County in southeastern Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alabama-Coushatta Reservation, or 14 miles east of Livingston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alabama-Coushatta Reservation and Segno. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for southeastern Texas.
